### Bachelor of Arts
### Fashion Design & Retailing
#### Concentration in Merchandising
#### Framingham State University

<br> 

Renee will be receiving her BA in Fashion Design & Retailing with a concentration in Merchandising from [Framingham State University](https://www.framingham.edu/) in May 2020. She has worked at companies including [Nordstrom](https://www.framingham.edu/) and [Puma](https://us.puma.com/) in her 4+ years of working in the retail industry. 

Renee is eager to work at a company that will allow her to demonstrate her skills and knowledge in areas such as customer service, product knowledge, consumer textiles, and apparel merchandising. She also aims to bring innovation to the area of sustainable fashion in her future role. 

In her free time, Renee enjoys shopping, traveling, and dining out.
